title: Stock Holdings in Callon Petroleum Ra Pharmaceuticals and More
text:
13Ds are filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission within 10 days of an entity’s attaining a greater than 5% position in any class of a company’s securities. Subsequent changes in holdings or intentions must be reported in amended filings. This material has been extracted from filings released by the SEC from Oct. 17 through Oct. 23, 2019. Source: InsiderScore.com

Activist Holdings

Callon Petroleum (CPE) Paulson & Co. disclosed on Oct. 22 a 9.5% stake in the independent oil-and-gas explorer, equal to 21,593,523...
